message:
SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 31
“Count items per categories” 
Aggregates - Grouping 
@prefix ex: <http://example.org/> . 
 
ex:lemonade1    ex:price 3 ;  
                rdf:type ex:Softdrink. 
ex:beer1        ex:price 3; 
                rdf:type ex:Beer. 
ex:wine1        ex:price 3.50 ; 
                rdf:type ex:Wine. 
ex:wine2        ex:price 4 . 
                rdf:type ex:Wine. 
ex:wine3        ex:price "n/a”; 
                rdf:type ex:Wine. 
Data: 
Results: 
PREFIX ex: <http://example.org/>  
SELECT ?T (Count(?Item) AS ?C) 
WHERE { ?Item rdf:type ?T } 
GROUP BY ?T 
 
?T 
?C 
Softdrink 
1 
Beer 
1 
Wine 
3
speaker: SYSTEM
